local_intent: Yaw-align the end-effector to 90 degrees prior to approaching the bin lid handle.
assumptions: Bin and handle have been localized.
End-effector is already above the handle from a prior MoveAbove step.
coherence_with_global: Realizes the SetTCPYaw(90) step between MoveAbove(bin_lid_handle) and ApproachAndAlign, and verifies with AtOrientation(90).
